TextView.android:text: Important guidelines of E-Proctoring while attempting online examination March-April 2021. Calling on mobile phones are not allowed. No person is allowed to accompany the student. Web cam should be switched on all the time. Proper lightning should be on the face of student. Camera focus should be on the face of student. Wearing of earphones/headphones/airpods are not allowed. Note: Any violation of above said conduct rules observed during proctoring will be treated as Unfair Means Case (UMC).
